description: A PHP script for inserting menu items into a database, including an HTML form for user input and file upload handling.

methods.name: mysqli_connect
methods.description: Establishes a connection to the MySQL database.

methods.name: mysqli_query
methods.description: Executes a query against the database.

methods.name: file_get_contents
methods.description: Reads the contents of a file into a string.

methods.name: addslashes
methods.description: Adds backslashes before characters that need to be escaped.

methods.name: pathinfo
methods.description: Returns information about a file path.
